explanation: [0-0] A person in a racing suit is sitting in a go-kart with a blue rope tied to the back. The background is an outdoor track surrounded by green grass and some trees. Buildings and utility poles can be seen in the distance. At the top of the screen, there is a black text "Table Cloth Challenge" on a white background.
[0-4] Then, the person in the racing suit drives the go-kart forward with acceleration, pulling the blue rope behind. The camera then moves to the right, showing the surrounding grass and buildings.

[4-8] Next, a table covered with a red checkered tablecloth appears on the track. The blue rope is attached to the tablecloth underneath. On the table are a bouquet of flowers, a stainless steel basin, a box of cake, a jar of jam, and some other items. A man in a blue shirt is sitting beside the table, stirring something in the stainless steel basin with chopsticks in his left hand. Then the blue rope pulls the entire tablecloth off the table, causing the flowers and some other items to fall to the ground. The man stops what he's doing and looks up. It can be seen that the table is white with two tires pressed against each end under it.
